message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, and see how the game goes from here!
You're being too generous, let's take a bigger share this time!
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving away too much. Let's meet in the middle this time!
You're getting desperate, but I'm still not giving up. Take it or leave it!
I'm making a bold move, Bob. I think I deserve more, and I'm willing to take the risk to get it.
You're getting greedy, Alice. I'm taking the last chance to get a decent share.
I'm going all-in, Bob. I'm willing to give up my share to make sure you get something. Take it or leave it!
